QuestData.Title: Runecloth
QuestData.Description: In Timbermaw, we are content. We do not like strangers. This is good for us, but it is bad for trade.$B$BNot long ago, a rare night elf friend came to Timbermaw and she wore a runecloth cloak. Runecloth is rare among us, but the cloak was so fine my people want me to make more runecloth clothing.$B$BWill you bring me runecloth? If you bring me enough, then I will give you something in trade.
QuestData.LogDescription: Bring 30 Runecloth to Meilosh in Timbermaw Hold.
QuestData.CompletionText: Do you have the runecloth? My people are eager for more items of runecloth!
QuestData.RewardText: Ah, you brought the cloth. Such fine material it is!$B$BThank you, $n. You are a true friend. Please accept this in exchange.
